job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: The vision of the Azure Solutions Team in Azure CXP is to empower every Azure customer and Azure service provider with best in class troubleshooting experiences to solve any issue or answer any question they have. This mission requires a highly scalable, reliable, constantly evolving infrastructure, and extensible platforms. We are a platform team that deals in full-stack development to define, implement, and own end-to-end experiences that other teams extend. The experiences are shipped on the Azure Portal and APIs (ARM Troubleshoot resource provider) expose the capabilities to several other portals in all Azure clouds. We support 250+ active developers a month and the solutions that they make on our platform run >30M times a month.  We are a young, agile, and dynamic team with a startup culture that loves to take on big challenges, solve them and unleash the vibrant developer ecosystem, that we have grown over the years, to write extensions and leverage the solutions we define and implement. This ecosystem is coupled with steady platform adoption by many Microsoft services that is constantly challenging us with customization requests and simplicity demands. As a member of the team, youâ€™d be getting opportunities to deal with these technical challenges on a regular basis and take our platform innovation to next level.  We are looking for motivated, accomplished, and proven software engineers who are eager to tackle frontend frameworks and innovative ideas to reuse controls that highlight the information from each solution across multiple clients. The candidate will get the opportunity to define, drive, build and manage services ground up with strong fundamentals to help Azure customers have a great troubleshooting experience. We are heavily invested in React in all the clients we support. The candidate is expected to drive horizontal efforts that improve the fundamentals of shipping and running a service across all the sister teams too.
